front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions in support of End-to-End GMPLS-based Recovery

abstract.t: This document describes protocol specific procedures for GMPLS (Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching) RSVP-TE (Resource ReserVation Protocol - Traffic Engineering) signaling extensions to support end-to-end LSP protection and restoration. A generic functional description of GMPLS recovery can be found in a companion document.
